instructions.title: How To Delete Your Uber Account
instructions.before: There are two Options for Deleting your Uber Account. You can either Delete your account from within the Mobile App or Send a Message to Customer Service  from the Uber Website.  Both options will permanently delete your account.

qnAnswers.question: What happens when I delete my account?
qnAnswers.answer: If you request to delete your Uber account, it will be immediately deactivated. After 30 days, your account will be permanently deleted. Deleting your account will also permanently remove any credit, promotions, or rewards linked to your account. Please note, if you decide to keep your account, you can restore it within 30 days of deactivation by signing in to the app.

qnAnswers.question: I forgot my password.  Can I still delete my account?
qnAnswers.answer: Yes and No. If you are unable to reset your password or access your account please get in touch with Uber at Accounts and Payments.  There you will be able to receive help from Customer Service to recover your password. [Click here] (https://help.uber.com/h/53cf8809-a0fc-4856-8706-de637266d4f3) for more information.  Or you can [Click here] (https://auth.uber.com/login/forgot-password) to navigate to Ubers forgotten password link.

steps: This is the Confirmation Message once your Account is Deleted

slides.alt: Uber-Delete Account from iOS. Step 1: Tap Uber App
slides.title: Uber App

slides.alt: Uber-Delete Account from iOS. Step 2: Tap Three Bars Top Right
slides.title: Three Bars

slides.alt: Uber-Delete Account from iOS. Step 3: Tap Settings
slides.title: Settings

slides.alt: Uber-Delete Account from iOS. Step 4: Tap Privacy
slides.title: Privacy

slides.alt: Uber-Delete Account from iOS. Step 5: Tap Delete My Account
slides.title: Delete My Account

slides.alt: Uber-Delete Account from iOS. Step 6: Enter Password and Click Verify
slides.title: Verify Password

slides.alt: Uber-Delete Account from iOS. Step 7: Tap Continue
slides.title: Continue

slides.alt: Uber-Delete Account from iOS. Step 8: Tap Prefer Not To Say
slides.title: Prefer Not To Say

slides.alt: Uber-Delete Account from iOS. Step 9: Tap Delete
slides.title: Delete

slides.alt: Uber-Delete Account from iOS. Step 10: This is the Confirmation Message once your Account is Deleted
slides.title: Confirmation Message

steps: [Click here] (https://help.uber.com/h/24010fe7-7a67-4ee5-9938-c734000b144a) for the Uber Delete Link. Then Scroll down to the bottom of the page.
Type Yes under 'Do you wish to delete your account' and then Choose a Reason for Deletion
Type a Deletion Request and then Click Submit

slides.alt: Uber-Delete Account from Website. Step 1: [Click here] (https://help.uber.com/h/24010fe7-7a67-4ee5-9938-c734000b144a) for the Uber Delete Link. Then Scroll down to the bottom of the page.
slides.title: Delete Link

slides.alt: Uber-Delete Account from Website. Step 2: Type Yes under 'Do you wish to delete your account' and then Choose a Reason for Deletion
slides.title: Reason for Deletion

slides.alt: Uber-Delete Account from Website. Step 3: Type a Deletion Request and then Click Submit
slides.title: Deletion Request
